tool_description: Scans directories and catalogs digital assets, extracting basic technical metadata and file properties for collection processing.

directory_path.description: Full path to the directory containing digital assets to scan

file_extensions.description: File extensions to include in scan

extract_technical_metadata.description: Whether to extract technical metadata like dimensions, duration, etc.

error_messages: Directory not found: Ensure the directory_path exists and is accessible
Permission denied: Verify read permissions for the specified directory
Invalid file extensions: File extensions must be strings without dots
Scan timeout: Large directories may require chunked processing
usage: Provide a directory_path to scan. Optionally specify file_extensions to filter results, set recursive_scan for subdirectories, and enable extract_technical_metadata for detailed file analysis.

total_files.description: Total number of digital assets found

file_paths.description: Full paths to all discovered assets

file_types.description: Unique file types found in collection
